.if($account.is-domain-admin, equal, true)

Admin

Review Comments Needing Approval
.else() .if($account.is-moderator, equal, true)

Moderator

Review Comments Needing Approval
.end() .end() .if($account, equal, nil)

Login

Register

.else()

Logout - .show($account.name!)

.end()
